title: The Traditions of U.R.F

embed.description: As riot have stated many many times and gave a massive months heads up urf won't be returning on april the 1st, is this offical message not clear enough for people? can they not read? sure you guys may be complaining that it will only be 4 days of urf compared to 14 days but isnt change good?

replies.body: Dear riot, please give us Urf {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
they already bloody said they would starting bloody may. over all you people complaining you didn't get it.
They're not angry that its coming out in may; they're angry because Riot forwent tradition and didn't bring it out on 1st April.

there is no "tradition" shit they put it out once for a joke, people liked it, they did it again as another joke and now the jokes old. >4 weeks out of 341 weeks so where that damn tradition, that jack all, its not tradition. It was a blip in the time lapse nothing else.

That's the thing. Tradition is not set by Riot, it's set by the people and community.

Think of Christmas or Easter. How did those things become tradition? They repeatedly happened on the same day of the year every year since they started happening.

Riot set up the "beginning" of this tradition by bringing out U.R.F 2 years in a row on the same day, naturally everyone assumed that a 3rd year was coming.
Same with Riot's Showdown gamemode. It comes out every Christmas now, or in your ideaology perhaps not. It will just be another " blip in the time lapse nothing else."

But someone's gotta Hate the Haters. Or Hate the Haters of Hate. I don't even know anymore. Maybe Riot is just setting up the community to consume itself with hate and that's the joke?

Easter same day? this year it was 27 march last year was 5 april, Easter is moving.

Something needs to be in the running and last like that for at least 5 years to even become a fledgling tradition. This has only gone for 2 years, no where near there. Thats like saying "oh crap i killed someone in self defense, blah blah found not guilty live good until next year when they are assaulted again, and up killing someone again, get tried not guilty blah blah. And go "HUH MUST BE A TRADITION".

> Riot forwent tradition 

Because that's such a big surprise...
make that shorter an ill read it but i got the message and for more information read my thing on lol,boards,micellanious,'AMERICA GOT URF AND WE DIDNT!'
Give everyone a bobblehead skin inside the chroma pack and up the whole thing to 975, happy days.
This is what happens when a money hungry company ignores it's playerbase. I'm just going to sit back and watch this game & useless company  fall to pieces {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

If April Fools was URF every year, then it is pretty predictable for an April Fools joke. Draven Day is something new and I expect next year to be something different too. I remember 2013, I think that was the year they did that Cho'Gath Rampage style game and Teemo game, that was cool. And URF in 2014 was an awesome April Fools, the year after it was alright, but didn't spend too much time with it, but that's just me probably.

And with adding game modes to a queue for weekends, they can keep on doing new game modes each year and aren't stuck with having to bring them back each year at a certain time. People shouldn't be wishing for April Fools to be predictable and boring every single year. Same goes for Snowdown.
